skills.skill: ETL onboarding for log feed technologies

duties_responsibilities.duty: Understand and manage data feeds of various security tools and logs for SIEM & UEBA technologies.
Craft new content use cases based on threat intelligence, available log data, and previous incidents.
Remediate vulnerabilities in different application environments.
Collaborate with security teams to identify gaps in analytical capability.
Develop parsers/field extractions and custom scripts to facilitate content development.
Participate in root cause analysis on security incidents and provide recommendations for containment and remediation.
Fulfill audit, regulatory compliance, and corporate security policy requirements.
Create, implement, and maintain novel analytic methods and techniques for incident detection.
Ensure documentation for content is available and current.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree or higher degree in Computer Science, Information Security or related field is preferred.
